workHistory.title: Software Developer
workHistory.description:
E-commerce oriented web application development  through teamwork following the software development methodologies like SCRUM .
                            Performance testing  and validation of information systems.
                            Back- End : ASP.NET MVC & Web API , PHP .
                            Front- End : Bootstrap, Angular JS, JQuery , HTML & CSS, Smarty .
                            Persistence : Entity Framework , MySQL & PostgreSQL.
                            Others: Docker, Vagrant, Amazon WS SDK, PayPal SDK.
                            Other skills:
                            As a freelancer I have worked on projects related to the following technologies in order to learn from each and bring diversity to my range of knowledge :
                            PHP laravel
                            Ruby & Ruby on Rails
                            NodeJs
                            AngularJS
                            MEAN

workHistory.title: Technical Support Analyst CNC
workHistory.description:
Management ERP System Oracle JD Edwards: Creating and installing packages, troubleshooting and updates. Using tools such as Oracle Server Manager and Oracle WebLogic.
                            Basic administration of Oracle Database 11g.
                            Manage tool based HelpDesk software Numara Trackit using DBMS like MS SQL Server 2012.
                            Server Management and Web applications.
                            Basic management of services like ADDC, DHCP and DNS.
                            Implement virtualization strategies to achieve efficiency in the IT service. Hyper-V Server 2012 R2.
